TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateVisualStateAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateVisualStateAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateVisualStateAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示控制項可以處於特定狀態，而且 是控制項的 中的預期項目。

span.span: Specifies that a control can be in a certain state and that a is expected in the control's .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項作者會使用這個屬性來指定並屬於他們控制的物件。Control authors use this attribute to specify the and objects that belong in their control's . 例如，假設您建立具有兩個名為的視覺狀態的新控制項`Focused`並`Unfocused`，這兩個中的名為`FocusStates`。For example, suppose that you create a new control that has two visual states named `Focused` and `Unfocused`, both of which are in a named `FocusStates`. 若要指定要他們可以使用這些視覺狀態的作者加入兩個控制項類別簽章屬性。To specify to authors that they can use those visual states, add two attributes to the class signature of the control. 指定屬性是`FocusStates`且屬性是`Focused`其中一個與`Unfocused`其他。Specify that the property is `FocusStates` and that the property is `Focused` for one and `Unfocused` for the other. ## Examples 下列範例示範的類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩種狀態，名為`Positive`並`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他兩個狀態，命名`Focused`並`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 建立控制項，具有可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至屬性物件。The property corresponds to the property of a object. 若要指定的項目所屬在中，設定屬性。To specify what a belongs in, set the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範的類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩種狀態，名為`Positive`並`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他兩個狀態，命名`Focused`並`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 建立控制項，具有可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會對應至屬性。The property corresponds to the property of a . 若要指定的項目所屬的控制項，將屬性。To specify what belongs in a control's , set the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範的類別簽章`NumericUpDown`控制項。The following example shows the class signature for the `NumericUpDown` control. 這個範例會指定`NumericUpDown`控制項使用四個視覺狀態。This example specifies that the `NumericUpDown` control uses four visual states. 兩種狀態，名為`Positive`並`Negative`，位於名為`ValueStates`。Two states, named `Positive` and `Negative`, are in the named `ValueStates`. 其他兩個狀態，命名`Focused`並`Unfocused`，位於名為`FocusedStates`。The other two states, name `Focused` and `Unfocused`, are in the named `FocusedStates`. 完整的範例，請參閱 < [ 建立控制項，具有可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For the entire example, see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md).
